ginnak awiluna pasu ginna niwatnata mahath uthsahayak gannawata wada yam ginnak awilennata prathama ee ginna awilennata hethu monawada yanna pilibadawa nithara nithara soya wamasa bala piliyam karannata apa pelambaenne nam me samajaya thula ada athiwi thikhena gatalu rashiyama wisadiya hakiya.
ee wanawitath thaman polis ugulata kotuwi athi bawa nodath thriwil ratha riyadura thaman wisin alutha handunagath "banku mithurage" aashawan sansindawima pinisa idiripathwa aththe ethan sitaya.
me nisa hondama wisanduma rathinynya, ginikeli bhawithaya awama kirimayi.
ema awasthawedi dilshan eeta ekaga wi aththe arbudayak nirmanaya wima walakwa ganima sadahayi.

ee wagema memagin idam, polis, paripalana balathala siyalla palath sabhawalata laba di thibenawa.
aata labenawalu diwyaloke indan maithri bodhisathwayingen paniwida.
dan inna eka boru kiyanna danne nathi nisado, jokarla hathara denekma maddiya sakachchawak kiya patta komadi so ekak pennuweya.
me pansale punchi hamuduruwo pansalata amuththo enawata harima manapayi.
oya de siduwana bawa kalinma pawasuwemu idiriyata wenna athi de meseya.

pahara ganu labuu madhushka harish da silwage birinda, mayuri inoka athulu madhushkage pawule gnyathinda, hithawathunda, madhushka soya yana gamane di mayurita sahaya wena athurudahanwuwange pawul ekathuwe, ka‡∑äristhiyani sahayogitha wyaparaye saha api purawasiyo sanwidhanaye samajikayin da, shuddhawu pawule pawidi sohoyuriyan da kithunu pujaka uthuman da ada dinaye di anuradhapuraya nawa basnawathumata pamini magin dahasaka pamana piirisak da mema mahajana pethsamata sahaya palakaramin thama nama satahan thabiya.
